'''Thunder Summoner's Crown''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Thundering Fury]].

==Description==
In the ancient tribe that worshiped the Thunderbird, elder shamans {{sic|worn}} this crown.

The Thunderbird soared through the thunderstorms, raining down purple thunder and rain.<br />Ancient tribes feared its powers and thanked it for its blessings.<br />Shamans were chosen to offer blood sacrifices to it for protection and forgiveness.

The Thunderbird was still a monster that cared not for the worship of mankind.<br />They knew it not, and regarded the unpredictable actions of the Thunderbird as divine revelations.<br />Yet thunder was its breath, as were the fates of men.<br />From the sky, men were no different from animals.

Until one day a song pierced through the roaring thunderstorm.<br />The song ripped through the clouds, and bestowed upon it, light.
